SEARCH

Class UserControllerTest

java.lang.Object
UserControllerTest
class UserControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive JUnit Test suite for the UserController class.

This test class utilizes Reflection to access and verify private UI logic, Factories, and Exception handling to ensure maximum Code Coverage.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Constructor Details

    • UserControllerTest

      UserControllerTest()

  • Method Details

    • initJfxAndEnv

      @BeforeAll static void initJfxAndEnv()
      Initializes the JavaFX Platform to prevent "Toolkit not initialized" errors. Sets mock environment variables for email service.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test case. Creates a dummy data file, initializes the controller, and injects UI components.
      Throws:
      Exception - If initialization fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up resources and deletes the temporary test file after each test.

    • testPrivateBooleanLogic

      @Test void testPrivateBooleanLogic() throws Exception
      Tests private boolean logic methods using Reflection.

      Targeted methods: isCurrentUserBorrower, isBorrowedOrOverdue. This ensures logic branches inside private helpers are covered.

      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection access fails.

    • testRowFactoryStylingComprehensive

      @Test void testRowFactoryStylingComprehensive()
      Tests the RowFactory logic for proper row styling.

      Simulates the updateItem method call to verify that rows are colored correctly based on ownership and status (Red, Green, Yellow).

    • testCellFactoriesLogic

      @Test void testCellFactoriesLogic() throws Exception
      Tests the custom CellFactory logic for Due Date and Fine columns.

      Ensures that private data (dates and fines) is hidden for items not borrowed by the current logged-in user.

      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection access fails.

    • testSpecificCellFactory

      private <T> void testSpecificCellFactory(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Media,T> col, T val, String myUser, String otherUser) throws Exception
      Helper method to test a specific column's CellFactory logic via Reflection.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the column data.
      Parameters:
      col - The TableColumn instance.
      val - The test value to display.
      myUser - The current user's username.
      otherUser - Another user's username.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.

    • testLogoutExceptionCoverage

      @Test void testLogoutExceptionCoverage() throws Exception
      Verifies that handleLogout handles IOExceptions gracefully.

      This test forces an exception by invoking logout in a headless environment, ensuring the catch block is covered.

      Throws:
      Exception - If an unexpected error occurs.

    • testBorrowFlow

      @Test void testBorrowFlow() throws InterruptedException
      Tests the complete flow of borrowing a book.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the FX thread is interrupted.

    • testReturnFlow

      @Test void testReturnFlow() throws InterruptedException
      Tests the complete flow of returning a book.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the FX thread is interrupted.

    • testPayFlow

      @Test void testPayFlow() throws InterruptedException
      Tests the complete flow of paying a fine.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the FX thread is interrupted.

    • testBadFileParse

      @Test void testBadFileParse() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Tests the file parsing logic when the data file contains corrupted or malformed lines.
      Throws:
      IOException - If file writing fails.
      InterruptedException - If the FX thread is interrupted.

    • performBorrow

      private void performBorrow(int index) throws InterruptedException
      Helper method to simulate a Borrow action on a specific table index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item to borrow.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the FX thread is interrupted.

    • injectTableRow

      private void injectTableRow(javafx.scene.control.TableCell<?,?> cell, javafx.scene.control.TableRow<?> row) throws Exception
      Helper method to inject a TableRow into a TableCell using Reflection. Essential for testing CellFactory logic without a full UI scene.
      Parameters:
      cell - The TableCell to modify.
      row - The TableRow to inject.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.

    • initializeUIComponents

      private void initializeUIComponents() throws Exception
      Helper method to initialize mock UI components and inject them into the controller.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.

    • runOnFxThreadAndWait

      private void runOnFxThreadAndWait(Runnable action) throws InterruptedException
      Utility method to run a Runnable on the JavaFX Application Thread and wait for completion.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to execute.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted.

    • createTestFile

      private void createTestFile() throws IOException
      Creates a temporary CSV file with dummy book data for testing.
      Throws:
      IOException - If file creation fails.

    • injectField

      private void injectField(Object target, String fieldName, Object value) throws Exception
      Reflection helper to inject a value into a private field of the controller.
      Parameters:
      target - The object instance.
      fieldName - The name of the field to set.
      value - The value to inject.
      Throws:
      Exception - If reflection fails.

    • getField

      private <T> T getField(Object target, String fieldName)
      Reflection helper to retrieve a value from a private field.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The expected return type.
      Parameters:
      target - The object instance.
      fieldName - The name of the field to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The field value.
